bibliographic-data.invention-title: COMPUTERIZED MANAGEMENT SYSTEM FOR MULTI-CHAIN PROMOTIONS AND RELATED AUDIT SYSTEM

abstract.p: A promotion management system identifies store-selected identifiers as necessary to implement a particular promotion across multiple store chains. An audit system compares number of promotion offers distributed to number of linking items sold.
